title: How is girls hostel in thapar? - Quora
tags: Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology

response.answer_text: I have lived in each GIRLS hostel during my 4 years of B.Tech.(Hostel-G,Hostel-E,Hostel-PG,Hostel-I) The facilties provided by the hostel are very good which include good food,TV room,gym in every hostel,friendly staff,sports room and ofcourse well mantained rooms. Although there is no provision of cooler or AC in the rooms bt now when i think of it,it is for the benifit of the students.Now we can any survive in any environment we are subjected to.  So yes all in all Thapar hostels are good to consider.

My sister has is an ex student of this institute. According to her, Thapar Institute has one of the best hostels. TIET hostels are perhaps the most hygienic and close to home experience you’ll get. Each block in the hostel has a separate arrangement of water purifiers & bathrooms with geysers. There is high speed internet connection in each block. GYM facility is also provided to students. T.V. Room with sitting facility and newspapers are also provided  The food which is of good quality is served in hostel mess, both in terms of hygiene and taste.
